title: Moleculight
team: Hyunjung Kim, Chaeeun Lee, Myeongseong Kim
summary: An interactive modular lighting system composed of Steinmetz solid lighting modules.
Users can construct long or short, linear or crosslinked light structures.

paragraph: Moleculight is an interactive modular lighting system composed of Steinmetz solid lighting modules.

As bicylinder-shaped Moleculight lighting modules are assembled in a line as a typical fluorescent lamp using ring-shaped links, a cylinder with decorative patterns of light on the lateral surface of the system is created.
Users can construct long or short, linear or crosslinked light structures.
This work won 2020 International Busan Design Award: Special Prize.
